https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dGZNN70ffCyOsYqqMTYFeMySxjB.jpg Bruno is a young film editor who has just broke up his marriage with Regina, and returned living in his mother's house. Drowned in deep sorrow, something very weird happens in his life: people around him are gradually disappearing. But only for him. Some kind of blindness. A Man Amidst Bees
